评论详情: This were great shoes until I wash them. They completely fell apart. I have never seen shoe soles completely release from shoe like that. It's like they were put together with water based glue.
My son loves these. Get several pair as the bottom wears out pretty fast as it is a minimal shoe in all aspects. Top and cloth part of shoe has stood up to wear.

评论概述: Feel like a ninja in these!
评论详情: I'm only a few days into wearing these but for my foot I finally found a barefoot shoe I've been looking for!  These fit perfectly, snug but not tight at all. I tend to do a bit of flopping in barefoot shoes but not with these.  I really feel the ground, I can do anything in them.  So far so good.  My only wish is that they came in more colors other than drab. The brown look good. I'm happy but all this grey and black nonsense. Not everyone is an incel.  Strongly recommend but of course your foot shape could vary.

This product is by far the best value I have gotten out of a shoe. I work from home in an office shed so I am going in and out of the house several times a day. This shoe takes constant abuse from removing every time I’m in and out. So far the wear and tear has been minimal. Comfort is out of this world. Fits great even with wide feet. First week or so I had an adjustment period to minimal shoe, after my feet hardened, it was much better.  Going to be buying more. I used to use Merrill slip ons and those wouldn’t even last the year.

评论概述: The shoes look okay but were returned due to a size issue.
评论详情: The shoes look fine but were returned - very large compared to the written sizes (we checked in centimeters before ordering). After the return, the supplier quickly processed the refund.
Exactly like the description
It is very comfortable and flexible to wear at home all the time. You can go out with it but I wanted a shoe just for inside so it stays clean.
They seem to use either a poor adhesive or to little of it. I have had them less than 2 months and the souls are already coming off all around.
Very comfortable

评论概述: runs 1/2 size small, excellent casual shoe.
评论详情: i normally wear a 12, i am returning for a 12+1/2. update: upping them from 4 to 5 stars because i love them. i highly recommend.
A la medida y muy cómodos.

评论概述: Very comfortable shoe to walk in
评论详情: Lightweight and comfortable

Picked these up as 'house shoes' as I work from home and have hard wood floors (and "winter is coming").  True to Size (with a lots of room); I wouldn't size down 1/2 in fear of loseing length for the toes.  Not cushioned, so very minimalist (I threw in some soft insoles with arch support as I wanted the ergonomic/barfoot shape), Sole is NOT thin or felxible like a traditional BF shoe, it's very stiff but not as stiff as regular trainers would be.  Seem to be holding up very well 4 months in of dail/nightly wear.

I love my hand made moccasins made by Blaxk Jacket Tackle company.  Most barefoot shoes thatI have seen advertised are more expensiv than I was willing to try but for thirty something dollars I was willing ro try these and am glad I did.  They have a lot of toe space and don"t look bad.
Los zapatos me dan una comodidad suprema y facilitan mi labor diaria
Runs Small. Easy return/refund. Next size up was not available. Seemed like it would have been a comfortable shoe had it fit. Initial thought in quality/craftsmanship was satisfactory.
nice
I wanted an easy to put on shoe that was comfortable to wear as well. This is both. Love the feel. Wish they had more colors. I just ordered my second pair.

I like everything about the shoes except the sizing. Ordered 13-wide since I normally wear 12-12.5 and thought that way I'd have plenty of room in them. Not so, they fell like about 11-11.5 and not as wide as I was led to believe. Also there is no flexibility in the opening so no way they can be called slip on for someone with a wide size 12-13 foot. Style is nice, they are lightweight. As others have said not much support, but for just around the house should be okay. I'm going to hope wearing them will stretch enough to make comfortable, but only time will tell.
I have a wide foot and these fit well. Only downside is they are rubber and plastic and they make my feet sweat. Not enough to not use them but slightly annoying.
The no squeeze design works well for barefoot lovers! They're breathable, light and durable! Would buy again with another color!
Worst fitting shoes I ever bought.  Poor quality. Not worth the price.
Lightweight, breathable, washable and comfortably cool.
Comfortable, quality, appearance love these shoes, so easy to put on and off.
Cool

Been rocking these bad boys almost everyday so far this summer. Love that they slip right on without using hands. Love that there's plenty of toe space in the front. Love that they're minimalist so they do wonders for my plantar issues. Overall great shoes.
Shoes definitely have some heft to them, so they aren't necessarily "minimalist" but they aren't horrible. Easy on and off. fairly lightweight.

I like this product mostly the slip in feature, it is also fairly comfortable but for someone with somewhat low arch like myself I would have preferred a higher insol, it is still very comfortable and easy on the eyes too.

评论概述: You'll have to ask Porch Pirate
评论详情: They looked nice anyway :(

评论概述: Bulky shoes that are not minimalist sneakers
评论详情: These shoes are advertised as minimalist sneakers but the soles are actually thick and inflexible. The shoes are noted as wide but they are actually extra-wide and the fabric buckles when you walk in them. They are cheap and not worth returning. I'll use them as throw away shows when I do painting someday or go to the beach. Improvements would be better sizing and an honest description of the soles which you cannot run in if you are seeking running shoes as I was.

This is a purchased item that I also paired with a set of Vine Item insoles.  The supplied insole was adequate although it did not have much arch support.  My feet felt like they were walking mostly on a hard surface without shoes.  The insoles provided not only additional arch support, but increased comfort level also.  According to the manufactures sizing charts, it said I should wear a size Eur 40 when other shoes I have purchased with European sizing were 42's. I think a 42 would have been more comfortable in ball of my foot area as I need a little wider than the 40's provided on one foot.  The additional insoles exacerbated the issue a little as I'm not having to wear them in a little in order to loosen the one shoe up.  Otherwise, the foot size was perfectly suited for a slip-on shoe as the shoe does not ride up on the heel.Overall, this is a comfortable shoe for when you need to slip it on and off several times a day without having to bend down.

As an active guy who splits my time between the city and hiking trails on the weekends, these barefoot-style shoes are so versatile. They're extremely lightweight and flexible, almost like wearing socks, but with enough traction and foot protection for all environments. The wide toe box allows my feet to splay naturally. And the zero drop sole provides good ground-feel while still having some cushion. Whether hitting the gym, going for a run, or just walking around doing errands, these are my new everyday kicks. Took a little adjustment coming from bulky sneakers, but love the minimalist feel.
Comfortable with a wide toebox.  There is no support for your arch.  They’re pretty flat inside.Normally wear about a 14. I ordered 13 1/2 and they seem to fit OK
They work well. They are comfortable. We will see how durable they are.
Have not owned the shoes a full month where every day the inside around the big toe is coming apart.

评论概述: Not quite minimalist shoes. Minimalist quality and comfort.
评论详情: I'm a decently sized dude (6'1" 235) with rather big flat feet (13.5 EEEE). I've had leg issues from my flat feet for years, and was always on a search for something that would help. A few years ago I tried the minimalist shoes things, and I've done great - I've been very happy with minimalist shoes, and it usually keeps me happy. I wanted a pair of slip-ons - so I purchased these - and I regret it tremendously. I've worn many types of minimalist shoes, so my complaints regarding comfort aren't related to them being minimalist shoes (just poorly designed).  Although they are supposed to be minimalist shoes, there is padding in the back and underneath the heal - leads to a lot of cushioning that I'm trying to avoid, and it affects fitment. The soles are also much too thick - so you don't feel the ground beneath your feet, and it requires more effort to flex the soles.  THE GOOD: Wide toe box - this is what saved these shoes from being rated 1 star. The toe box is quite wide, and that portion is quite comfortable. The design is as pictured - not amazing, but it's fine. You can slip on - the rigid piece of plastic means you don't have to bend over to pull them on.  THE BAD: They're not minimalist - there is way too much cushioning around the heal - this leads to a lot of play and movement around the heal when you're walking. The rigid piece of plastic is angled backwards, making it easier for the heal to slip out. The pieces are all glued together - looks like it'll fall apart without too much time. There is a flimsy piece of plastic holding the fabric up around the toes - after less than a mile walking it started to fold in - leads to a weird wavy appearance around the toes. They just feel like my feet around going to fall out.  Bottom line - I'll wear them a little bit - as soon as I have an excuse to replace them I will. Would never order again.
They feel great look great and are comfortable
Poor quality

I’ve ruined my feet through walking through 50 plus sports stores. I finally stumbled through these reviews and found these these. Simply put, These shoes are terrific and I’m pleased.!  Every person experiences pain suffering challenges but this was a uniquely amazing for me and I rarely use the word amazing to describe any thing.

I am 70 YO and wear a 13-wIde shoe.  Ordinary sneakers are to heavy on my feet, to bulky to keep me stable when I walk the track or stand to excerise.  Even extra wide sneakers gave me sore spots at pressure points  And they were hot..  The features of thieseminimalist barefoot shoes shoes solved my issues, wide, light weight, cool and at a much lower price than a brand I see advertised a lot.

These shoes are very lightweight and flexible. the Sole is flat which makes it a good choice for certain exercises like deadlifts however I found it to be a little too thick to qualify as barefoot. Fit is wide and the toe box is roomy but I found it to be slightly short at the same time. Be aware.

评论概述: Cómodos, flexibles y buen material. Si tienes tobillo ancho no lo compres.
评论详情: Los compré recientemente por lo tanto no puedo opinar de su durabilidad. En apariencia es buen material. Resultan cómodos y tienen buen aspecto para el uso cotidiano informal, no deportivo. Como aspecto negativo tener en cuenta que el escote a la altura del tobillo es muy bajo. Los compré para un familiar de edad avanzada y cuyo tobillo es ancho. Si bien el largo le quedó muy bien y en general es cómodo, lo que falla es que le queda muy bajo a la altura del tobillo. Tuvimos que quitar la plantilla interior para que el pie entre un poco mas dentro del calzado. Estamos evaluando si en donde reparen zapatos pueden agregar un complemento elastico a la altura del escote para evitar que se le puedan salir mientras camina.

评论概述: Feel great, also work like compression socks for me.
评论详情: Very happy with these. They are easy to put on, and they are snug enough that they keep my feet from swelling.  I take a 9.5 wide shoe. Bought a ten and have room left in the toes.

评论概述: Fits fine but not for outdoors
评论详情: These are indoor shoes. Not really outdoor. I suppose it could be fine to wear certain places like if you need some shoes on for a quick drive or stop in a store it would be fine but actual outside wear is not ideal.  Not really sure if this is a non zero drop shoe.  Overall, it's okay for limited use. I was expecting more, but they're okay.
My husband loves them!! Like being bear foot

This is actually a two-part review: one for the dark gray pair I received as a Vine product and one for the light gray pair I bought after receiving the Vine-provided pair.  I have been wearing these shoes for a couple of months now, and I love them. They are (for me at least) incredibly comfortable and just stylish enough to garner random compliments. I actually got these as a replacement for wearing Crocs out in public, and I was so happy I bought the second pair.  These shoes have worn nicely during my time with them (logo on the insole worn from all the miles I've actually worn them), with no manufacturing flaws in either pair. As stated previously, they look nice (in the colors I received). I love how you can step right into them and they stay on, with no flopping or falling off, while also being easy to step out of. They are super light and feel like you have nothing on at all.  I will be buying these again should the pairs I have wear out. Oh... and the price is great!

Everything seems just right. The toe box is as wide as I hoped. Zero drop heel-to-toe. If you're like me and these things are important to you these shoes deliver. I wanted them as inside shoes. You can slip them on without bending over. It has stiffer than normal construction behind the heel and it sort of opens backwards to allow an easier transition into the shoe. The materials seem really nice. I just got them so I can't speak to durability, but they look pretty classy, maybe even better than the pictures do them justice. The mesh of the entire shoe is quite breathable. Barefoot works, but I think the material might be a little rough for long term wear. So it's not really a slipper. My grip6 socks feel perfect in them. I might buy an extra pair or two to throw in the closet because I think they're perfect.

These shoes slide onto your feet like slippers. I found them to be super comfortable and breathable. I tend to have sweaty feet so the breathability has been amazing. I've worn them around the house, out for errands and even for long days at work. They look great and are comfortable, which is pretty much all you can ask for in a shoe. As far as sizing goes, they fit my feet like a glove. I usually want to have a little extra room in a shoe, but the flexible material makes up for this.  I will say that the rubber soles are a little soft. This is a good thing in one regard, as it allows the shoes to flex with your feet. But conversely if you're walking on chunky gravel you will feel every rock. Even so, it hasn't bothered me enough to give these anything less than a perfect rating.

I brought the recommended 10.5 size, did not fit. Way too big. Got the 8 and 9, both too small. Checked back, 9.5 is available. Good fit, super comfortable, not zero drop. These shoes are advertised as zero drop. Inspected, not shaped like zero drop, inside has a higher heel than ball of the foot. I really wanted these shoes to work. Their slip on function is fantastic, but it's not zero drop like they advertised. Also, post a sizing chart! Not all sizes are the same across companies. That would mean less returns!

评论概述: Men's Wide Slip On Minimalist Barefoot Shoes Zero Drop Sole Cross-Trainer Sneaker
评论详情: These sneakers run large and wide so order accordingly, they are not comfortable
These were ordered in a size 11, but thery're European sized and were too big, sent them back for a refund.

Thought with the wide toe box I’d be good at true to size ordering. I probably should have went up a size. Hoping they break in with continued use but for now a snug fit. They are my first pair of wide toe box shoes, and they take some getting used to for sure.  But for this product itself, seems well made and the style is smooth enough for this type of shoe for me. Competitively priced from what I’ve seen.

This doesn't matter to me but there is not a lot of arch support. It is literally the same as barefoot.  There is a lot of room in the toe box and I think they are comfortable. Easy on and easy off. Just step into them.

I can't say I'm going to do a lot of running in these, I don't know how they'd hold up. If I HAVE to assume, I'd say they'd be quite alright.  I'm here for the comfort, and how cool they feel. It's HOT down here. They're very light, and held up well to some very relaxed hiking. For the price, I'd recommend giving them a chance.

Comfortable - Kinda. Breathable - Yes. Lightweight - Yes. Cross-Trainer - No. Trail Running - No. Walking Shoes - Maybe. These fit more like slippers, not true shoes. They also fit large, so they are sure to slip off if used as anything other than house shoes. Easy to slip into, so for me, they are nothing more than expensive slippers.

I wear mostly zero drop barefoot shoes from the much better known brands out there and these hold their own.  They are very comfortable, fit to size, and are very easy on and off.  They are "no frills" and don't even come packaged in a shoebox which makes them feel cheap.  But for a casual weekender or quick trip out - they are great.  The only thing I don't like is I wish the sole wasn't so "red" and they do come with a strong chemical smell but that airs out quickly.

评论概述: Super comfortable, easy to put on, with a roomy toe-box
评论详情: These shoes have a soft fabric upper that fits snugly and is very comfortable. They have zero drop, and that means the heel is not raised up like in most shoes. I don't have a strong preference about this but find they are very nice to wear. Also the toe-box is wide and fits my feet perfectly without crowding my toes. I also like that the back (heel portion) of the shoe is stiff and acts almost like a built in shoe horn for ease of slipping your foot in without bending down. I didn't think that was something that would add a lot of value to my life, but now that I'm used to them I really appreciate it. These shoes seem to have excellent, fit, traction, and are made out of nice looking material. I recommend them heartily if you are looking for a casual comfy sneaker that's easy to put on and take off.

These shoes are great to wear on many different occasions and I really like how they fit.  The Upper is made up of a slightly stretchy neoprene material and it feels very comfortable on the foot.  You have a reinforced heal which makes it easy to insert your foot and the insole is nice and thick.  I love the toe box it gives you foot room to breath and makes for a comfortable feel.  The sole itself is thin so the shoes have a foot on the ground feel and to me feel like driving shoes.  Overall nice pair of shoes that I use for quick wear and as a back up gym shoe.

评论概述: Good quality shoe, fits about 1/2 size big
评论详情: Thin and minimalistic, there is not a lot of cushion in the insole, but I still find them very comfortable. They are breathable and keep my feet cool. The toe box is definitely wide, and it looks a little bit goofy, but it's worth it for the comfort. The materials used are high quality and they are well put together as well as being very lightweight. They slip on and off easily even barefoot. I find they fit about 1/2 size bigger than I was expecting.

I'm pretty impressed with these shoes for the price.  They're lightweight, they're comfortable, and they're breathable.  They're sized correctly and fit as expected.  They look pretty decent and I think they're a great value at the current price.  I'd buy them again.Recommended.
Besides being, absolutely gorgeous, they’re so comfortable they fit well and I bought a second pair

评论概述: Good slip on for the summer
评论详情: This are Good slip On for the summer. It is easy to slip in and get out. There is plenty of room for your toes. So no squeezing like with other shoes when you have wider feet. The grip is good for indoors in the gym and outdoors on normal walk ways. Light and comfortable.

Shoes in a wide size are hard to come by. This pair of gray water shoes for men fits perfectly. They are true to size and roomie at the top for wider feet. They are made well and will last a long time. Also a great price.

I usually wear a 13 medium but they didn't have my size so I ordered 13 and a half wide and they fit great. These shoes easily slip on or off your feet with ease and they have great traction I'm very satisfied with these shoes I wear them around the house like slippers!

These are super comfortable, light-weight shoes with a nice rubbery grip on the bottom.  The material is soft and they fit well too.  Also, I’m really starting to enjoy wearing these kinds of zero-drop shoes.  It felt a little weird at first, but now feels more natural.  Highly recommended.
Good fit, comfortable for the gym, love them!

These are decent shoes, but they do run a little larger than I had anticipated. They're a little loose on me, which is a shame. I got them because I liked the way they look, not because I would use them for running. I've run in the past, but I wouldn't think these would be suitable running shoes. The area across the toe is wide, which makes them roomy. I wasn't crazy about the way the front and back tabs around my ankle looked. They're definitely good in many ways, and they feel very comfortable on my feet. I like the black color as well.

Hey, my wife tells me they are ugly. Whatever. I like this pair of shoes. These have wider toe area and does not "squeeze" my toes like other same sized shoes would. It's not the prettiest, but it's good enough for me to ignore it for my own comfort. I walked about 6000 steps wearing these for a day, and did not notice anything uncomfortable, except my wife's death stare.  Just beware that if you ever see yourself walking on gravel, this pair of shoes may not be for you, unless you enjoy the massage thru the sole.

Prior to receiving a pair of these "Barefoot" shoes, my faves were a pair of Skechers costing twice as much.  But these babies just blow me away!  First, they are supremely comfortable; they almost feel like a second skin on your feet. They're also breathable, lightweight, and easy to put on and take off.  Second, I love the way they look; I got them in the khaki color, and they're very fashionable with jeans or slacks.  I can't say how durable these shoes will prove, but right out of the box (or plastic bag, in this case) these are my new favorite shoes...  Two big toes up!

评论概述: Comfortable, cool in warm weather, could use thicker insole
评论详情: These slip on shoes are great. I like to wear simple slip on shoes like this for slippers or “house shoes”. They breathe nicely to keep my feet cool, are waterproof in the event I go to the mailbox in the morning and the dew is in the ground, and they truly are “slip on”. No need to bed over to put them on. I can’t give these 5 stars because the padding on the insoles isn’t very thick. They’re comfortable, but they could be softer. Aside from that, I really like these and have no regrets with having ordered them. I may even order a second pair to keep at the lake house.

评论概述: Great construction quality! Length good, however width too narrow. Even barefoot.
评论详情: Let me say I've a 12 to 13 us men's size foot. Ordered a 13.5. Received EU 47 which according to chart from famous footwear website equates to US 13. All seemed good? But if I had been trying these on in person? I would have asked to try next size up due to width across top of foot being constrictively narrow on me. The length is fine, plenty of toe room. But the constrictive width caused some difficulty to put shoe on by stepping into it. Now after wearing for a couple hours, the fit became more comfortable. So there may be a "breaking in" period. I was also able to step into the shoe as described at that point, but not at first. Quality of construction seems top notch as does the ample length and toe room. However I cannot give more than 4 stars because of the tight width and initial difficulty to put on.
These are the most comfortable and wide shoes that I’ve had in a long while. Certainly a big improvement over the water shoes from long ago. I recommend these for casual wear and athletes.

المنتج وصلني مغلف ببلاستيك وبدون صندوق .. جربته نص ساعة مشي وكانت التجربة ليست مثالية .. لا يحمي من الصدمة التي تسببها خطواتك على البلاط وتشعر بها في العظم وهذا غير مثالي لمن يعاني من وزن زائد .  الحذاء خفيف صحيح لكنه غير صحي في المشي
